characters.title: Mother of Dragons
characters.sentence: All men must die, but we are not men.

characters.title: King of the North
characters.sentence: There is only one war that matters. The Great War. And it is here.

characters.title: Lady of Winterfell
characters.sentence: I hate the king more than any of them.

characters.title: No One
characters.sentence: Leave one wolf alive and the sheep are never safe.

characters.title: Maester
characters.sentence: I was nothing at all. And when you're nothing at all, there's no reason to be afraid.

characters.title: Kingslayer
characters.sentence: By what right does the wolf judge the lion?

characters.title: Lady of Casterly Rock
characters.sentence: The only way to keep your people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy.

characters.title: Lord of Winterfell
characters.sentence: I asked him, how can a man be brave if he's afraid? That is the only time a man can be brave, he told me.

characters.title: Hand of the Queen
characters.sentence: Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armour, and it can never be used to hurt you.

characters.title: Captain of Sea Bitch
characters.sentence: It's better to be cruel than weak.
